com.sogou.flow.utils

Class DataParserTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sogou.flow.utils.DataParserTools

  • public class DataParserTools
extends Object
    Copyright 2014 SOGOU All right reserved.

    The data parser is used to parse json by dom4j document and the queried table data.

    Author:
    Qun He

      The method will get useful params from args to json objects , so the map can be request mapping and then the results should be the data queried from the DB.

    • Method Detail

      • parseByDocument

        public static net.sf.json.JSONObject parseByDocument(String productName,
                                     String dimension,
                                     org.dom4j.Document document,
                                     net.sf.json.JSONObject jsonObject,
                                     Map<String,?> args,
                                     Map<String,?> results,
                                     int depth)
        The method will get useful params from args to json objects , so the map can be request mapping and then the results should be the data queried from the DB.
        Parameters:
        productName - the current product
        dimension - the specified dimension of the current object
        document - dom4j document, from the dataSchemaFile
        jsonObject - the object to be add datas eg:jsonObject from the results map
        args - the variables container
        results - the result returned from the DB, key is the dimension and value is the queried results
        depth - the depth of the offsprings using by dimension further searching
        Returns:
        json string (final result)
